title: Security Engineer, Employee Experience & Productivity
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger...
description: Conduct security architecture reviews and threat modeling of various applications. Execute security penetration tests across diverse applications, simulating attack scenarios to assess efficacy of security controls and provide recommendations for remediation. Improve the security posture of multiple applications by working with developers, engineers, and other cross functional teams. Design and develop innovative tools and products for increasing security and providing ready access to security metrics for multiple applications. Conduct code and design reviews to proactively identify security vulnerabilities in implementation. Establish security best practices and evangelize their adoption across multiple teams.
preferred_qualifications: OSWA, PenTest+, or OSCP certification. 4+ years experience with penetration testing. Solid technical expertise using high-level programming language like Java, or Python and strong knowledge of various operating systems and networks, especially experience with Linux. Proficient in building tools and scripting automations. Experience with cloud technologies is a plus.
